label: start
text: 212435! 212436! 212437! Ohh hey Commander! You caught me doin' my usual jumping, Whats up?

choices.text: What in Tyria is this… TINY, everyone is talking about?
I want to join [TINY]! Where do I sign?
…Jumping? Whatever for?
I'll let you get back to your jumping.

label: about_tiny
text: Ahh, I see our scouts have found us another worthy of the [TINY] tag. We are everywhere in Tyria and always stalking Asura looking for new members.

choices.text: I'll take that as a compliment, I guess, but go on.
Ohh, I don't know if I'm ready for commitment.

label: about_tiny_2
text: TINY is the premier all-Asura guild! We dabble in shenanigans, but we specialize in fun. There's never a dull moment in TINY!

choices.text: <DEAD END>
<NEEDS TEXT>

label: start_joining
text: Love the enthusiasm Commander! But… first, there is some fine print I need you to look over. Nothing to worry about, unless you are a Sylvari in disguise.

choices.text: Ohh boy! I love fine print!
Rules and regulations? What is this, a guild run by Asura? I'll see myself out.

label: joining_2
text: Ok, First and most important, TINY is an all-Asura guild. So that means if you decide to show off your membership, you'd best be on your Asura character.

choices.text: Got it; if I rep, I will only do it on my Asura.
Asura creep me out, I'm not even sure why I'm here.

label: joining_3
text: Next, be nice to everyone, even to Bookahs. We are here to have fun and enjoy being Asuras!

choices.text: That seems reasonable, whats next?
I, <insert name here>, am a bookah and do not know how to be nice.

label: joining_4
text: Now, for a touchy topic, politics and religion. I could go on for hours about Councillor Phlunt or The Eternal Alchemy, but those topics are best not discussed in any TINY communication channels.

choices.text: Fine, I wont talk about how horrible Phlunt is.
B-B-But Councillor Phlunt is a nice guy.

label: joining_5
text: Last one, I swear! Get it? Because this rule is about swea…oh nevermind. Anyway, I might be a genius progeny, but I am still a progeny and so are other TINY members, so please refrain from swearing; you're better than that Commander.

choices.text: Nice and simple. I think I can follow these rules.
This all seems way too hard for my bookah brain to follow.
Can I jump with you?
<NEED TEXT>
